subject: Re: Simsonn Pro Plus Pedals- Software
description_text:
Hello again,

Thank you for the detailed instructions. That’s exactly what I needed to
resolve my issue and now my pedals are fantastic!

Thanks again for your help!

On Tue, Jun 3, 2025 at 6:25 AM support <support@simsonn.com> wrote:

>
> Hello, the version you provided is too outdated.
>
> You can manually update the firmware by following these steps:
>
>
> Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Select Pedals → Choose
> the file plus.sfu to upgrade.
>
> After completing the update, the issue should be resolved.
> ​
> ---- 回复的原邮件 ----
> 发件人 General and sales enquiries<service@simsonn.com> <service@simsonn.com>
> 发送日期 2025年06月03日 19:00
> 收件人 技术支持<support@simsonn.com> <support@simsonn.com>
> 主题 转发：Re: Simsonn Pro Plus Pedals- Software
>
>
>
> ----------转发的邮件信息----------
> 发件人：Ryan Huestis<ryan.huestis430@gmail.com>
> 日期：2025年6月2日 周一 9:36
> 收件人：General and sales enquiries<service@simsonn.com>
> 主题：Re: Simsonn Pro Plus Pedals- Software
>
>
> Hello,
> Thank you for your reply, however I already have the latest version 2.0.7
> and you can see from my screenshot that it still states the version is too
> old. Please fix this so I can use the pedals I have purchased from you.
>
> On Sun, Jun 1, 2025 at 1:29 AM General and sales enquiries <
> service@simsonn.com> wrote:
>
>> Hello, I'm sorry for not replying to you in time. We are on Dragon Boat
>> Festival holiday. You can click the link to download the latest version
>> 2.0.7
>> https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
>>
>>
>>
>> On Sat, May 31, 2025 07:26 AM Ryan Huestis<ryan.huestis430@gmail.com>
>> wrote:
>> Hello,
>>
>> I have downloaded the software off of your website however it does not
>> let me calibrate my pedals. It states that it is too old (please see
>> screenshot attached). How can I resolve this? there is no other software or
>> any drivers to download.
>>
>

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4889 中
